name: Elite Sniper Shooter 3d - Army Commando Shooting
name_original: Elite Sniper Shooter 3d - Army Commando Shooting
description:
Elite sniper shooter 3d is the top action games with INITIATING GLOBAL OPERATIONS around the world.
Time for diplomacy is gone . This is time for drastic war action . Aim to sniper 3d shot at evil, wherever it hides and join best sniper hero around the world . shoot to kill as this is not only a games and having no room for remorse here.

Stunning fps fight against evil commando enemies

Mn Features :
• 45+ action missions
• Soldiers, armored vehicles, air units and many more enemy classes
• Sandstorms, blizzards, rainstorms and other rich atmospheric effects
• Unbelievable 3D graphics that will bring you to the near future, from urban skyscrapers to exotic locations
• Next-gen “bullet time” effects capture your every amazing sniper head shot

This sniper 3d games gives you lots of variety of 3d modern weapons

• Gather components to upgrade your military arsenal
• Unique features of sniper 3d guns
• Unique personalization for your weapons
• Real sniper 3d rifles, assault rifles
